attributes.action: never allow Creationism or Intelligent Design to be part of any Science Curriculum for Primary or Secondary Education in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Creationism is completely incompatible with the study of Natural Science and its legacy from many civilisations for the last 3 Millenia.

Creationism strictly belongs to the faculty of Religious Studies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
